name: Manufacturer Brand for WooCommerce
author: Adewale Emmanuel Awodeyi

sections.description:
This plugin extends the product details for WooCommerce to embed manufacturer name so-called brand. Complete solution for brands (manufacturers)
management in your Woocommerce shop. Please visit demo.

Free Version features:

  • * Just for only new product.
  • * Unlimited number of brands.
  • * Manufacturer is the term to use on the website .
  • * Widgets not included for filtering products by brands in shop sidebar.
  • * Cannot turn off Brand info tab on product details page.
  • * Cannot hide label “Manufacturer” on product details page.
  • * Display both label “Manufacturer/brand” and Brand info” tab on product details page
  • * Cannot set dimensions of the image/logo width and height.
  • * Only one predefined positions to display label “Manufacturer” on product details page

Premium Features:

  • * For already published product or new product.
  • * Unlimited number of brands.
  • * Choose the term to use on the website (Brand or Manufacturer).
  • * Widgets included for filtering products by brands in shop sidebar.
  • * Brand info tab on product details page, can be turned off /on.
  • * Show or hide label “Manufacturer/brand” on product details page
  • * Display both label “Manufacturer/brand” and Brand info” tab on product details page
  • * Set dimensions of the image/logo width and height.
  • * Several predefined positions to display label “Manufacturer/brand” on product details page
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

With automatic installation WordPress handles the file transfers so it is the easiest option and you can do it from your
WordPress dashboard. Just navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New. In the search field type “WSB Brands” to find
the plugin. When it appears in a search results, use “Install now” button. When it is installed, activate it and plugin
is ready to use.

Manual installation

  1. Using FTP, upload entire wsb-brands folder to your site’s /wp-content/plugins/ directory. If you have downloaded
    a zip file, then you can also use the Add new option in the Plugins menu in WordPress and upload it and install in a
    few clicks.
  2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu in WordPress and you are ready to go.
sections.faq:
Where can I add brands?

Link to Add new brand page can be found in submenu of WooCommerce Brand menu at Admin

Where can I edit brands?

Link to brands manager page can be found in submenu of WooCommerce Brand menu at Admin

Where is the settings page?

Link to brands settings page can be found in submenu of WooCommerce Brand menu at Admin

How can I assign a brand to my product?

On a product add/edit form you can find a brand select list. Select brand and
save/update the product.

  • * Initial release of the plugin, June, 14, 2023.
